item.title: Maryam add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "I'm sick of just liking people. I wish to God I could meet somebody I could respect." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Maryam add a quote by J. D. Salinger
item.description: "Don't ever tell anybody anything. If you do, you start missing everybody." -- J. D. Salinger

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Jean-Paul Sartre
item.description: "Hell is—other people!" -- Jean-Paul Sartre

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Michel Foucault
item.description: "هر جامعه رژیمِ حقایق‌اش را دارد. هر جامعه، سیاستِ کلی حقیقت‌اش را دارد یعنی انواعی از گفتار را می‌پذیرد و به عنوانِ حقیقت به جریان می‌اندازد.‏ نیز در همین جوامع مکانیسم و نهادهایی هستند که باعث می‌شود گفتارهای درست یا نادرست از هم تشخیص داده شوند.‏ راه‌هایی به کار گرفته می‌شود تا این و آن را مجازات کنند تکنیک‌ها و روش‌هایی برای به دست آوردنِ حقیقت، ارزشمند قلمداد می‌شوند و همین‌طور جایگاه کسانی که وظیفه دارند بگویند چه چیزی به عنوانِ حقیقت کارآیند است.‏" -- Michel Foucault

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Colleen McCullough
item.description: "There is a legend about a bird which sings just once in its life, more sweetly than any other creature on the face of the earth. From the moment it leaves the nest it searches for a thorn tree, and does not rest until it has found one. Then, singing among the savage branches, it impales itself upon the longest, sharpest spine. And, dying, it rises above its own agony to outcarol the lark and the nightingale. One superlative song, existence the price. But the whole world stills to listen, and God in His heaven smiles. For the best is only bought at the cost of great pain… Or so says the legend." -- Colleen McCullough

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "And you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free." -- Anonymous

item.title: Maryam add a quote by علیرضا روشن
item.description: "فصل عوض می‌شود جای آلو را خرمالو می‌گیرد جای دلتنگی را دلتنگی" -- علیرضا روشن

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Mark Lawrence
item.description: "We’re built of contradictions, all of us. It’s those opposing forces that give us strength, like an arch, each block pressing the next. Give me a man whose parts are all aligned in agreement and I’ll show you madness. We walk a narrow path, insanity to each side. A man without contradictions to balance him will soon veer off." -- Mark Lawrence

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Laini Taylor
item.description:
"Once upon a time, an angel and a devil fell in love.
It did not end well." -- Laini Taylor

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafón
item.description: "The moment you stop to think about whether you love someone, you've already stopped loving that person forever." -- Carlos Ruiz Zafón

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafón
item.description: "Destiny is usually just around the corner. Like a thief, a hooker, or a lottery vendor: its three most common personifications. But what destiny does not do is home visits. You have to go for it." -- Carlos Ruiz Zafón

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafón
item.description: "I believe that nothing happens by chance. Deep down, things have their secret plan, even though we don't understand it." -- Carlos Ruiz Zafón

item.title: Maryam add a quote by حافظ
item.description: "ما آزموده ایم در این شهر بخت خویش بیرون کشید باید از این ورطه رخت خویش..." -- حافظ

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Henry Miller
item.description: "The one thing we can never get enough of is love. And the one thing we never give enough of is love." -- Henry Miller

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Henry Adams
item.description: "Chaos often breeds life, when order breeds habit." -- Henry Adams

item.title: Maryam add a quote by امید صباغ نو
item.description: "در استکان من غزلی تازه دم بریز" -- امید صباغ نو

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Pierre Boulle
item.description: "There's always some further action to take." -- Pierre Boulle

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Carl Sagan
item.description: "Every one of us is, in the cosmic perspective, precious. If a human disagrees with you, let him live. In a hundred billion galaxies, you will not find another." -- Carl Sagan

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Marilynne Robinson
item.description: "در عشق، قضاوت روا نیست. تناسبی هم در آن وجود ندارد و لازم هم نیست وجود داشته باشد زیرا عشق به هر شکل خاصی که باشد فقط یک لحظه یا یک حکایت کوتاه است از قبول واقعیتی غیرقابل فهم. هیچ معنایی نمی توان از آن انتظار داشت چرا که حادثه ای ابدی در گذر زمان است. از این رو چطور می تواند مطیع علت یا معلول باشد؟ مریلین رابینسون، کتاب گیلیاد" -- Marilynne Robinson

item.title: Maryam add a quote by George Moore
item.description: "We humans are more complicated than animals, and we love through the imagination." -- George Moore

item.title: Maryam add a quote by ابوسعید ابوالخیر
item.description:
"گفتم: چشمم، گفت: به راهش می‌دار
گفتم: جگرم، گفت: پر آهش می‌دار
گفتم که: دلم، گفت: چه داری در دل
گفتم: غم تو، گفت: نگاهش می‌دار" -- ابوسعید ابوالخیر

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Irwin Shaw
item.description: "There are too many books I haven’t read, too many places I haven’t seen, too many memories I haven’t kept long enough." -- Irwin Shaw

item.title: Maryam add a quote by کامو
item.description: "همیشه روزهایی هست که انسان در آن کسانی را که دوست داشته است، بیگانه میابد" -- کامو

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Ralph Ellison
item.description: "What and how much had I lost by trying to do only what was expected of me instead of what I myself had wished to do?" -- Ralph Ellison

item.title: Maryam add a quote by محمد رضا شفیعی کدکنی
item.description: "طفلی به نام شادی، دیریست گم شده ست/ با چشم های روشن براق/ با گیسویی بلند به بالای آرزو/ هر کس ازو نشانی دارد ما را کند خبر/ این هم نشان ما :/ یک سو خلیج فارس / سوی دگر خزر" -- محمد رضا شفیعی کدکنی

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Mark Lawrence
item.description: "Hurt spreads and grows and reaches out to break what’s good. Time heals all wounds, but often it’s only by the application of the grave, and while we live some hurts live with us, burning, making us twist and turn to escape them. And as we twist, we turn into other men." -- Mark Lawrence

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "I suspect the truth is that we are waiting, all of us, against insurmountable odds, for something extraordinary to happen to us." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Steve Wozniak
item.description: "If you love what you do and are willing to do what it takes, it's within your reach. And it'll be worth every minute you spend alone at night, thinking and thinking about what it is you want to design or build. It'll be worth it, I promise." -- Steve Wozniak

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Keri Hulme
item.description: "You want to know about anybody? See what books they read, and how they've been read..." -- Keri Hulme
